MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH11 postcode area of Edinburgh. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7:20pm to safely carry out work on our equipment located on Polwarth Gardens and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:58pm on Friday, 05 March 2021
